data.comment: The match has started at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nantes's area.
Saint-Etienne take a 0-1 lead thanks to Adil Aouchiche.
Yvan Neyou with an assist there.
In the minute 3, Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nantes are pushing forward but Marcus Coco's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Nantes push forward at Stade de la Beaujoire and Andrei gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint-Etienne defence.
In the minute 7, Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yvan Neyou for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nantes close to the penalty box.
Nicolas Pallois for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Randal Kolo Muani of Nantes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Antony Gautier awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes close to the penalty box.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 16, Play has been interrupted briefly in Nantes to check on Ludovic Blas, who is grimacing with pain.
Ludovic Blas is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 17, Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
Antony Gautier signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Nantes.
Nantes's Ludovic Blas misses with an attempt on goal.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Nantes.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 27, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Aimen Moueffek gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Nantes close to the penalty box.
Antony Gautier awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Nantes.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 33, Saint-Etienne are in shooting range from this free kick.
Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nantes's area.
Antony Gautier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Nantes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 40, Free kick in a good position for Nantes!
Can Nantes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Aimen Moueffek (Saint-Etienne) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 43, Marcus Coco (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, At Stade de la Beaujoire the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Nantes advance rapidly upfield but Antony Gautier blows for offside.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Nantes.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 51, Saint-Etienne drive upfield and Denis Bouanga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Romain Hamouma is on a sub for Arnaud Nordin for Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 59, At Stade de la Beaujoire, Nantes are penalized for being offside.
Saint-Etienne make their first substitution with Lucas Gourna Douath replacing Zaydou Youssouf.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 61, Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Nantes surge into the attack at Stade de la Beaujoire but Randal Kolo Muaniâ€™s header is off-target.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint-Etienne will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nantes.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Abdoul Kader Bamba is replacing Marcus Coco for the home team.
Yvann Macon puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 66, That's a fine assist from Adil Aouchiche.
Nicolas Pallois (Nantes) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes.
In the minute 69, Nantes's Andrei breaks free at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Nantes.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Moses Simon pulls one back to make it 1-2.
In the minute 71, Great play from Dennis Appiah to set up the goal.
Antony Gautier awards Nantes a goal kick.
Antony Gautier signals a Nantes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 73, In Nantes Nantes's Abdoul Kader Bamba is caught offside.
Important block from the Saint-Etienne defence as Moses Simon fires in a strike for Nantes.
Ludovic Blas (Nantes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 75, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
The away team replace Adil Aouchiche with Kevin Monnet-Paquet.
In the minute 77, Saint-Etienne make their fourth substitution with Maxence Rivera replacing Denis Bouanga.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
The match at Stade de la Beaujoire has been interrupted briefly for a check on Yvan Neyou, who is down injured.
In the minute 80, Yvan Neyou for Saint-Etienne is back on the field again.
Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Abdoulaye Sidibe.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 82, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Antony Gautier signals a Nantes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Nantes.
In the minute 84, At Stade de la Beaujoire, Abdoulaye Sidibe has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Renaud Emond is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
The home team have replaced Ludovic Blas with Renaud Emond. This is the second substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Mehdi Abeid with Abdoulaye Toure.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Moses Simon of Nantes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nantes.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Nantes.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
Nantes's Abdoul Kader Bamba has been booked in Nantes.
